channel.title: ABC on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in ABC on Liam Getreu

item.title: Interviewed on PM on Israel's new government
item.description: I was interviewed on ABC’s PM program after Naftali Bennett’s government was sworn in.

item.title: Interviewed on ABC's The World in the aftermath of the Gaza war and violence inside Israeli mixed towns
item.description: In the aftermath of the escalation of violence between Israel and Palestinians I was interviewed on ABC’s The World with Beverley O’Connor.

item.title: On ABC News discussing Israel’s plans for annexation
item.description: I was on ABC The World discussing Israel’s plans for annexation and the Australian government’s response.

item.title: Discussing the Trump deal, Israeli annexation, elections and President Rivlin’s visit to Australia on ABC News
item.description: The White House has hailed the Middle East peace plan the "deal of the century", but Palestinian leaders are calling it a conspiracy - @liamget from @NIFAustralia tells @bevvo14 whether the deal could lead to more conflict.

item.title: On the Australian government’s decision to recognise West Jerusalem
item.description: I was interviewed for AM in gauging reactions from the Jewish and Palestinian communities on the Australian government’s announcement regarding West Jerusalem.

item.title: Discussing Israel’s new 'Nation-State Law' on ABC News The World
Interviewed on ABC RN Drive with Pulitzer Prize winner Geraldine Brooks
item.description: On 20 June, an interview on ABC RN Drive aired with Pulitzer Prize winner Geraldine Brooks and me, discussing the compilation of essays ‘Kingdom of Olives and Ash’, Geraldine’s contribution and the now 51-year occupation of the Palestinian Territories:

item.title: Interviewed on 7.30 in segment on Israel's crackdown on human rights organisations
item.description: I was interviewed on 7.30 as part of a report on the Israeli government’s proposed new laws aimed at curtailing the activities of human rights organisations.

item.title: Politicians' pandering does no good for Israel
item.description: My op-ed on the Republican primaries was published in ABC’s The Drum:
